Feature Req : Move Topic to Specific Group.
Ui Factor : In Dark Mode, header_menu_links are hard to read with white bg. Instead use .theme-dark .topic .background-color for bg.

Bug : When I Create a Group with Title and Description, and get back to home page without posting any topic in that group, that group is not visible any where to post topics. Possible solutions i can propose, while creating a topic show an option to user, weather he want to post it in list of groups available. also, small tweak while creating topic is, show clearly whether he is creating group or topic and allow only admin or super user to create new groups setting.

[ Feature Request ] : post/comment time in peer's local time and date.

Since we are all located all over the world, there should be a mechanism to show post author/commenter time. This may be configurable to be hidden via settings to reduce cluttering.
